data.prayer: Father, we ask for 17 new simple churches in the state of Wanica, Suriname. Place a simple church in every community of the 86,800 people living here.
data.verse: And blessed be His glorious name forever; And may the whole earth be filled with His glory. Amen, and Amen.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Wanica, Suriname
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 86,800 citizens of Wanica, Suriname, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 86,800 souls living in the state of Wanica with a taste for your Word. Make it sweet as honey in their mouth.
data.verse: How sweet are your words to my taste, sweeter than honey to my mouth!

data.prayer: Father, make bold the prophets in Wanica, Suriname so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Jew, Dutch people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Jew, Dutch people.
Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Wanica to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.prayer: Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the state of Wanica access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.prayer: Father, we cry out for a prayer movement in the state of Wanica, Suriname. Please, stir the 14,867 believers here to pray for awakening.

location.name: Wanica
location.people_groups_list: Sikiana, Saramaccan, Matawari, Surinamese, Dutch-speaking, Arab, Syrian, Han Chinese, Cantonese
